title: Introduction
text: Unpaywall, developed maintained team OurResearch, non-profit service finds open access copies scholarly literature looking DOI (Digital Object Identifier). returns open access full-text links, also helpful metadata open access status publication licensing provenance information. Unpaywall uses different data sources find open access full-texts including: Crossref: DOI registration agency serving major scholarly publishers. Directory Open Access Journals (DOAJ): registry open access journals Various OAI-PMH metadata sources. OAI-PMH protocol often used open access journals repositories arXiv PubMed Central. See Piwowar et al. (2018) comprehensive overview Unpaywall.

title: Fetch open access status information and full-text links using Unpaywall — oadoi_fetch
text: dois character vector, search single DOI many DOIs. rate limit 100k requests per day suggested. need access data, request data dump https://unpaywall.org/dataset instead. email character vector, mandatory! Unpaywall requires email address, can track usage notify something breaks. Set email address `.Renviron` file option `roadoi_email` options(roadoi_email = "najko.jahn@gmail.com"). can open `.Renviron` file calling `file.edit("~/.Renviron")`. Save file restart R session. stop sharing email using rcrossref, delete `.Renviron` file. .progress Shows plyr-style progress bar. Options "none", "text", "tk", "win", "time". See create_progress_bar details . default, progress bar displayed. .flatten Simplify open access evidence output. `TRUE` transforms nested column oa_locations open access evidence variable column row represents single full-text. Following basic principles "Tidy Data" makes data analysis export spreadsheet straightforward.
